name: Monster Dress Up
description:
Create your own fashionable monster girl!
Customize your monster, your outfit, your hairstyle, and choose from all kinds of accessories.

Save your creations in the downloadable Windows version at the bottom of this page! It is free, although donations are appreciated. :)

Follow our new games here: http://seafoamgames.itch.io/

We are no longer using this account to post games, so clicking "Follow Chantal Moosher" won't notify you of our new games.

Check out our new game, Eat All The Ice Cream Ever! (or play in browser)

Problems playing?

Make sure your browser supports WebGL: http://get.webgl.org/

The game is known to have compatibility problems with Internet Explorer 11. Please try another browser if it doesn't work properly.

If you are experiencing any bugs or other issues with the game, please e-mail us at:

monsterdressup@gmail.com

Please include which web browser you are using along with any details about the bug/issue. Thanks!
